Kingdom.text: {=Macedon3}Macedonia is a small but quickly expanding empire. that is... until The powerful king of Macedon, Philip II was murdered. Now his ambitious young son Alexander has secured the throne with the help of his mother Olympias.

Kingdom.text: {=Lusitani5}Arevaci, the land of the Arevaci originally comprised much of the highlands of the northern Spanish Atlantic coast including the whole of modern Cantabria province

Kingdom.name: {=Lusitani1}Lusitani
Kingdom.title: {=Lusitani3}Kingdom Of Lusitani
Kingdom.text: {=Lusitani5}The Lusitanians (or Latin: Lusitani) were an Indo-European speaking people living in the west of the Iberian Peninsula prior to its conquest by the Roman Republic and the subsequent incorporation of the territory into the Roman province of Lusitania.

Kingdom.name: {=Egyptfaction}Egypt
Kingdom.title: {=Egypttitle}Egypt
Kingdom.text: {=Egypt12text}Egypt has been a Satrapy of the Achaemenid Empire for nearly 200 years, but the rebellious and proud Egyptian people have always wanted their freedom from Persia.

Kingdom.name: {=Cyrenaica}Cyrenaica
Kingdom.title: {=Cyrenaica2}Cyrenaica
Kingdom.text: {=Cyrenaica3}Cyrene is a Greek colony on the coast of the Libyan desert

Kingdom.name: {=Nubia}Kush
Kingdom.title: {=Nubia2}Kingdom of Kush
Kingdom.text: {=Nubia3}Kush is a Nubian kingdom south of Egypt, that is known for having the greatest bowmen in all the known world

Kingdom.name: {=Nabatea}Nabatea
Kingdom.title: {=Nabatea2}Kingdom of Nabatea
Kingdom.text: {=Nabatea3}Nabatea is a kingdom in the Aramaic region

Kingdom.name: {=Judea}Judea

Kingdom.text: {=Judea3}Judea is in the souther parts of the region of Syria

Kingdom.name: {=Phoenicia}Phoenicia
Kingdom.title: {=Phoenicia2}Phoenicia
Kingdom.text: {=Phoenicia3}Phoenicians once ruled the trade over the sea with colonies as far west as Iberia and Muaritania

Kingdom.name: {=Assyria}Assyria
Kingdom.title: {=Assyria2}Assyria
Kingdom.text: {=Assyria3}the Assyrians warriors were well known and were often recruited by Achaemenid kings to serve in their armies.
